components.description: export this word and the related value in the XML format

components.description: show where this word has been used e.g. how many values are related

components.description: show the change log of this word

components.description: the plural language form field in a form (to be move to languages forms)

views.name: Start view
views.description: A dynamic entry mask that initially shows a table for calculations with the biggest problems from the user point of view and suggestions what the user can do to solve these problems. Used also as fallback view.
